title: (x) Vilda Faglar - Follies (filled and squooshed) {Mark S}
content:
Still feeling rather ridiculous for not having the eyes opened enough as to recognize that last sample I posted as being Gillies Gothic (again!) \*slaps on the face shouting: wake up!\* still I'd dare to beg for your help on a new couple of samples which I haven't so far succeeded on identifying. One of which is the following:   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052044im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25358.gif)   
   
And thank you already for your help.
author: ssmm

comments.content: Hey, they're not all that easy. This one and the other one you just posted are harder. This one rings a bell, but I don't have it yet.

Okay, I got it. It the old Letraset font [Follies](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052044/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=203819), but the inside lines have been removed and it's been artificially condensed. I don't have a clue on the other one.
